text.__SUMMARY__:
Tillandsia flabellata is a species in the genus Tillandsia. This species is native to southern Mexico (Veracruz, Oaxaca, Chiapas) and Central America (Guatemala, El Salvador, Honduras, Nicaragua).Two varieties are recognized:
Tillandsia flabellata var. flabellata - Oaxaca, Chiapas, Guatemala, El Salvador, Honduras, Nicaragua
Tillandsia flabellata var. viridifolia M.B.Foster - Veracruz
text.Cultivars:

Tillandsia 'Brooyar'
